job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van schaalbare en krachtige (AI) applicaties met behulp van het Laravel/Vue-framework
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development of scalable and powerful applications, indicating core software engineering activities.
This phrase indicates the realization of AI applications, which falls under the umbrella of software development with a focus on AI.
This phrase describes the complete lifecycle of developing AI applications, aligning with software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Incidenteel gebruik van low-code platforms zoals n8n en Flutterflow i.c.m. Je fullcode ervaring en skills
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning low-code, it emphasizes integration with full-code experience and skills, pointing towards software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the ability to translate complex concepts into practical applications for clients, indicating an understanding of business needs and applying technology to solve them.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode
job_tasks.justification: This points to improving a service methodology, which can encompass operational aspects of software development processes.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's
Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen
Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development (Laravel, Vue) and integrating low-code platforms. While AI is mentioned, there's no explicit mention of core GenAI Engineer tasks like fine-tuning LLMs, RAG, or advanced prompt engineering. The role seems more geared towards building applications that *use* AI rather than developing the AI models themselves.
